name: Toth + Co
description:
Toth+Co is a privately-owned agency made up of really smart and dedicated people—the kind you would expect from a branding, marketing, advertising and digital firm. The agency is based in Boston, Massachusetts with an office in New York City. 
We are the creative thinkers behind some of the most successful global fashion, lifestyle and retail brands. Our work possesses a thread of optimism sewn into every project.
